channel.title: VestaScape - The Ultimate Experience
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zqy4g7.png[/img][/center]
VestaScape has been a long term project for me, much love into this project and much success. This server is not just any ordinary server asides from all of the great active staff and updates we have unique things on this server that is hard to find now a days.
We are hiring a few coders, I WILL NOT accept ANYONE. Based on your application and the information provided I will consider having you on the team. Well, enough talking let me provide you people with some Pictures!
[center][IMG]http://gyazo.com/f8e38285f9cbff459f4ff5a99c43861c.png?1338354759[/img]
Nice GUI and login screen -
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d39c5d91ce1e5e9afed111ea37b62324.png?1338354810[/img]
Converted PI engine into Hyperion making the server run smoother.
Glacor Boots
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/7ed8fe8fbd41b41e81d420e37202ace4.png?1338354884[/img]
Automatic Login Screen Page updater - Showing how much you donated!
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/86d1e5945c735c966f2ea1089aede65c.png?1338354932[/img]
Quick Chat (Just like soul split)
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/53d1c45a4c82b7968ffd72c869481d0c.png?1338355001[/img]
More Pictures Soon!
Other Features -
- New Crowns - Redid Ranks - Intense Switching (Thanks to Imsuperman05) - In-Game Playtime - Quests - Custom Skilling Zone (50% Done) - 100% Pm System - Revamped Commands.java, Actionhandler.java and tons of others files to add Hyperion Engine - Fixed Fishing - Fixed Farming - Holiday Events - Redid Item.CFG - Created a lot of more cool funky shops! - Will add more tomorrow!
[/center]
Available Slots Programmer (Client/Source) - -
Beta Tester - Ix Soulcist xI -
Application Job Wanted: Source or Client(IF you are applying for Programmer): Why should I allow you access to this source?: Age: Past Projects?: MSN: Skype(Optional): Anything else that you may like to add?:
Also - Beta Testing is not ready yet

item.title: VestaScape - The Ultimate Experience
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

Job Wanted: Beta Tester
Source or Client: Both?
Why should I allow you access to this source?: Beta Tester.
Age: 17
Past Projects?: Delta, Project insanity, winterlove, Allstarscaoe
MSN: threeplay@live.com
Skype(Optional):weeddamn
Anything else that you may like to add?: Im good at pointing out bugs.

Read full topic

item.title: VestaScape - The Ultimate Experience
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:443458”]Job Wanted: Beta Tester
Source or Client: Both?
Why should I allow you access to this source?: Well, since I’m wanting to be a Beta Tester, I don’t need access to the source, I will need access to a client to be able to come on the source though.
Age: 16
Past Projects?: Bronze Age, Triton, Sabsabionline, Resurrection-PK etc.
MSN: IxJamesxI@live.com
Skype(Optional):
Anything else that you may like to add?: None, unless there are more questions that are needed to be asked of me.[/quote]

Accepted as Beta Tester, thanks for applying.

item.title: VestaScape - The Ultimate Experience
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[center][/center]

VestaScape has been a long term project for me, much love into this project and much success. This server is not just any ordinary server asides from all of the great active staff and updates we have unique things on this server that is hard to find now a days.

We are hiring a few coders, I WILL NOT accept ANYONE. Based on your application and the information provided I will consider having you on the team. Well, enough talking let me provide you people with some Pictures!

[center]

f8e38285f9cbff459f4ff5a99c43861c.png?1338354759773×562

Nice GUI and login screen -

Converted PI engine into Hyperion making the server run smoother.

Glacor Boots

Automatic Login Screen Page updater - Showing how much you donated!

Quick Chat (Just like soul split)

More Pictures Soon!

Other Features -

  • New Crowns
  • Redid Ranks
  • Intense Switching (Thanks to Imsuperman05)
  • In-Game Playtime
  • Quests
  • Custom Skilling Zone (50% Done)
  • 100% Pm System
  • Revamped Commands.java, Actionhandler.java and tons of others files to add Hyperion Engine
  • Fixed Fishing
  • Fixed Farming
  • Holiday Events
  • Redid Item.CFG
  • Created a lot of more cool funky shops!
  • Will add more tomorrow!

[/center]

Available Slots
Programmer (Client/Source)

  • Ix Soulcist xI
